wikipedia_page.main: Glenn Palmer (born 17 March 1945) is a British sprint canoer who competed in the mid-1960s. He was eliminated in the semifinals of the K-4 1000 m event at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo.

response: * Glenn Palmer (sheriff) (born 1961), sheriff of Grant County, Oregon
* Glenn Palmer (sprint canoer) (born 1945), British sprint canoer
